name: Creamy Pesto Bowties
ingredients: 4 chicken breast halves, cut into cubes
3 c. bow tie pasta, cooked and drained
instructions: Heat butter in large, deep skillet; add chicken and fry until cooked, stirring often. Stir soup, pesto and milk in skillet and heat to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook 5 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through. Stir in bacon and pasta and heat through.
